G

GameHandler - Class in controller
Class for keeping a game between two client(handler)s.
GameHandler(ClientHandler, ClientHandler) - Constructor for class controller.GameHandler
Creates a new LocalGame object.
gameOver() - Method in class model.Board
Returns true if the game is over.

Gets the board.
getBoard() - Method in class controller.GameHandler
Returns the board.
